body.p:
South Carrollton Ky June 21st 1861
Dear Governor,

Capt S P Love visits you in behalf of the Home Guard here, in order to procure arms for the same. Our locality is one more exposed than most others, being immediately upon a navigable River, and can be easily reached by water or land. We sincerely hope you will favor us with arms for the Guard

2
A. R. Jackson
Home Guards
Muhlenberg Co
Filed 25 June 1861.
